query: SELECT c.id "id!", c.tunnel_id "tunnel_id!", c.connected_from "connected_from!", c.start "start!", c.end "end!", COALESCE(( SELECT ls.upload FROM tunnel_stats ls WHERE ls.tunnel_id = c.tunnel_id AND ls.collected_at >= c.start AND ls.collected_at <= c.end ORDER BY ls.collected_at DESC LIMIT 1 ), 0) "upload: _", COALESCE(( SELECT ls.download FROM tunnel_stats ls WHERE ls.tunnel_id = c.tunnel_id AND ls.collected_at >= c.start AND ls.collected_at <= c.end ORDER BY ls.collected_at DESC LIMIT 1 ), 0) "download: _" FROM tunnel_connection c WHERE tunnel_id = $1 ORDER BY start DESC
